captions.text:
So I said, you'll have plenty of time for that,
in prison!

Oh my gosh, there's a little man
next to you.
No I saw him. I can see everything!
What uh- what are you doing here, Mario?
I'm gonna hang out with my people.

the super heroes, just  like everybody
else.
I don't think that's how this works.

I'm sorry, but just because you rescue a
princess from an unlocked castle does
Sorry pal, that's just normal hero.

I don't have to eat crazy plants to get
powers.
I can swim under water for a long time.
We are not the same dude.
I have no power so I wear a costume.
Let's uh-- let's not get carried away, Mario.
I don't wear raccoon ears and a tail.
Welp, I got nothing. I don't know what to do here.
We're gonna need a bigger booth.

comments.text:
Why do people consider invincibility as one of Mario's powers?
Its a random super star that once consumed by ANYONE will grant temporary 
invincibility. (Proven in Super Smash Brothers)

What are the odds the star will randomly float by while Mario is facing off 
VS someone?
On top of that who is to say the star won't bump into the other guy and 
give them powers instead of Mario﻿
